channel.title: Gavin Eadie on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Gavin Eadie on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: a2b3 lunch non-summary for January 10, 2013; Michigan Terminal System, miniaturized
item.description: I organize lunch every week on Thursdays at Eastern Accents in downtown Ann Arbor. About 400 people get some kind of invitation, and attendance varies from 6 to 25+. (One week we filled the restaurant, which was just a little bit scary.) This week's crowd was good - I counted 18 seats - and the question of the week was asking people to talk about the job they had in college.
